backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing bookings with create, read, list, and delete operations and simple field validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping highâ€‘level requirements to frontend source files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and applying Tailwind base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with SEO metadata, root mount point, and Google Fonts links.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app switching pages and rendering header, footer, and selected content.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form with validation, success UI, and submission via useSubmitBooking.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing branding, full contact details, service list, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation, contact strip, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all bookings or a single booking using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit new bookings through the backend actor and invalidates the bookings list on success.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with contact details and a booking form section layout.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of gallery images with a lightbox modal for viewing selected photos.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and calls to action for booking and contacting.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page showing a grid of photography service cards with icons, descriptions, and feature lists using Tailwind styling and animations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, containers, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and image asset needs for the VS Studio Photography website.
